subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_0207_01C9E845.E6FA98A0
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

K...thanks to both you and RJ for clearing that up.

Well that still jives =
with my theories on true EVP as well. That they aren't sound waves emitted =
in the environment. They are purely electromagnetic, which is why we call t=
hem Electronic Voice Phenomena.

April

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  F=
rom: Frank Ratka 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, June 08, 2=
009 2:27 PM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas





        Yes, because so=
undwaves by nature are measured through our environment. As RJ corrected an=
d reminded me they are pressure waves that are subject to the thickness of =
our atmosphere. Meaning they cannot be transmitted at th speed of light. Wh=
at they can do is be embedded in a carrier signal to be demodulated by the =
air and manifest back into physical sound.

        FRank R

        --- On=
 Mon, 6/8/09, April Abercrombie <april@...> wrote:=



          From: April Abercrombie <april@...>
 =
         Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas
          To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups=
.com
          Date: Monday, June 8, 2009, 3:24 PM


          So-

       =
   Sounds waves are separate and apart from the electromagnetic spectrum?

=
            ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: Frank Ratka 
  =
          To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 
            Sent: Monday, June 08, =
2009 2:16 PM
            Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas


               =
   Sorry, RJ. I stand corrected! Soundwaves are not EM waves because they l=
ack the EM component and are subject to our physical environment. Hence, ca=
nnot travel at the speed of light. 

                  That being said, the=
 heterodyne theory still stands. LOL

                  Frank R.

         =
         --- On Mon, 6/8/09, Frank Ratka <warrior18eii@ yahoo.com> wrote:

=

                    From: Frank Ratka <warrior18eii@ yahoo.com>
          =
          Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas
                    To: EVP-ITC@=
yahoogroups .com
                    Date: Monday, June 8, 2009, 3:05 PM


=
                          Tell me where the seperation on the spectrum take=
s place between 300Hz and 300KHz. Yes, soundwaves cause pressure waves that=
 our ears read as vibration and our mind translates as sound. The waves are=
 still on the electromagnetic spectrum. Even subsonic geomagnetic waves are=
 present on the scale. What I mean by power can be directll translated to v=
olume or amplitude. The only thing that distinguishes soundwaves from any o=
ther wave is the fact that we can hear them.

                          Fra=
nk R.

                          --- On Mon, 6/8/09, Rj <rasterer@yahoo. co=
m> wrote:


                            From: Rj <rasterer@yahoo. com>
    =
                        Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas
                  =
          To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
                            Date: Mo=
nday, June 8, 2009, 2:53 PM


                                No. Sounds wa=
ves are not on the electromagnet spectrum nor are they a form of electromag=
net energy. Sound waves are based on pressure waves in the air (or in other=
 substances).  Our ears detect these pressure waves and translate them into=
 sounds we here.  Our ear do NOT hear electromagnet energy.  Our eyes do: t=
hat part which we call visible light.



                                --=
- On Mon, 6/8/09, Frank Ratka <warrior18eii@ yahoo.com> wrote:


          =
                      From: Frank Ratka <warrior18eii@ yahoo.com>
         =
                       Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas
                   =
             To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
                                D=
ate: Monday, June 8, 2009, 12:38 PM


                                It so=
unds like she's saying "one, two, ....."

                                A=
 mistake that a lot of people make is thinking that there are two different=
 types of energy at work when it comes to sound waves and electromagnetic w=
aves. The only thing that seperates them is frequency and power. Radio wave=
s are radio waves because they occupy a certain block of the electromagniet=
ic spectrum. Sound waves exist on that same spectrum just farther down with=
 much longer waves. Soundwaves and subsonic waves can penetrate almost anyt=
hing because of their wavelengths. The shorter the wavelength the more ways=
 we can shield against them.

                                Think of micr=
owaves. These are also a type of radio and telemetry transmitting wave but =
the waves also have a physical effect on our environment by causing molecul=
es to speed up, which creates heat. A little lower than this is IR or infra=
red it too can cause physical objects to heat up but usually it just causes=
 molecules to rotate in place. All physical things give off IR light. Its a=
 way the total system conserves energy by spontaneously emitting IR radiati=
on.

                                Frank R.

                            =
    --- On Mon, 6/8/09, April Abercrombie <april@abercrombiegh ostresearch.=
 com> wrote:


                                From: April Abercrombie <apr=
il@abercrombiegh ostresearch. com>
                                Subject:=
 Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas [3 Attachments]
                                To=
: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
                                Date: Monday, Ju=
ne 8, 2009, 2:27 PM


                                Here is some food for=
 thought. I am currently reviewing my audio from our May 30th investigation=
.

                                It was me and another girl teammate pres=
ent in the room. I picked up a 3rd female voice on my digital voice recorde=
r that I carry with me. We were standing right next to another digital vide=
o recorder that I leave beside my night vision camera. That recorder did no=
t pick up this 3rd voice. I have asked the girl that was with me to check h=
er recording to see if she picked it up.

                                I=
 have long felt the true EVP does not come from sound waves in the environm=
ent, or then it wouldn't be EVP, but a disembodied voice. Somehow EVP's are=
 appearing directly on the recordings.

                                Thi=
s instance with the recorders may back that theory up. That other recorder =
should have picked that voice up if it were sound waves in the environment.=


                                I am attaching the clip of this 3rd voice=
. The file that is named "01-02-17 Clip" is the full clip. You will hear my=
 voice as I say "Yeah", and then another comes in right after that. I think=
 I know what it says.

                                Again, I was live mo=
nitoring my audio, but still did not hear this until playback. It isn't cle=
ar, so I am not as excited about it as my one's from the last investigation=
.


                                ----- Original Message ----- 
         =
                       From: Frank Ratka 
                                T=
o: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 
                                Sent: Monday, =
June 08, 2009 1:09 PM
                                Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC=
] New ideas


                                I have a running theory that =
EVP is carried on an untrasonic wave and demodulated exactly where they wan=
t it to manifest. It works off the heterodyne principle. If you mix two ult=
rasonic waves that differ one another in frequency then if you add or subtr=
act them together you get a beat frequency or alternate frequency. For exam=
ple, if a ghost is sending a signal at 54KHz and you have an electric fan i=
n a room creating an untrasonic frequency at 45KHz then you will have a int=
ermediate difference frequency at 9KHz, well within human hearing range (20=
Hz to 20KHz). This was just an example, but all electronic equipment genera=
tes ultrasonic signals just by turning them on. From this theory I always f=
elt that EVP were generated within a few inches of the recorder.

         =
                       We are able to reproduce this affect in not only rad=
io with superheterodyne systems but also with acoustics and audio as in som=
e passive sonars and a commercial produce called the "audio spotlight" by D=
r. Joseph Pompeii.

                                Frank R.

             =
                   --- On Mon, 6/8/09, Zack Widup <w9sz.zack@gmail. com> wr=
ote:


                                From: Zack Widup <w9sz.zack@gmail. c=
om>
                                Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas
      =
                          To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
                    =
            Date: Monday, June 8, 2009, 1:56 PM


                         =
       Fascinating! I've had this idea that the EVP are often not recorded =
by the microphone but somehow make their way in at the actual point where t=
he storage is made, whether it be analog (tape) or digital. 

             =
                   So much we don't know ...

                             =
   Zack

                                 
                                =
On Mon, Jun 8, 2009 at 1:39 PM, April Abercrombie <april@abercrombiegh ostr=
esearch. com> wrote:




                                I monitor my audio=
 live. The funny thing is that even so, those last EVP's I captured I did n=
ot hear either in the environment, or on my recording as it happened. I onl=
y heard them upon playback.

                                ----- Original=
 Message ----- 
                                From: Zack Widup 
         =
                       To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 
                      =
          Sent: Monday, June 08, 2009 11:40 AM
                            =
    Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas


                                I am=
 curious if anyone with a microphone wired to a remote site has ever gotten=
 any EVP in real time.

                                I took part in an i=
nvestigation of Ashmore Estates, near Ashmore IL, on Saturday night. We had=
 six video cameras set up in the three halls of the building. The video for=
 all was being monitored and recorded at a central location. Alas, we did n=
ot have microphones at the camera sites conected to the central location. I=
 wonder what we might have heard if we did?

                              =
  Zack

                                 
                                O=
n Mon, Jun 8, 2009 at 12:05 PM, threadsintyme@ juno.com <Threadsintyme@ jun=
o.com> wrote:


                                Let's just agree to end thi=
s discussion about her... 
                                Why don't we dis=
cuss something on a lighter note? Anyone have any new ideas about either ev=
p or ITC? 
                                Al

                            =
     

                                 

                                 =

                                <TABLE b=

                                =
<TBODY>
                                <TR>
                              =
  <TD vAlign=3Dtop>
                                <DIV>I have a running t=
heory that EVP is carried 
                                on an untrasonic=
 wave and demodulated exactly 
                                where they w=
ant it to manifest. It works off the 
                                heter=
odyne principle. If you mix two ultrasonic 
                               =
 waves that differ one another in frequency then 
                         =
       if you add or subtract them together you get a 
                    =
            beat frequency or alternate frequency. For 
                   =
             example, if a ghost is sending a signal at 54KHz 
            =
                    and you have an electric fan in a room creating 
      =
                          an untrasonic frequency at 45KHz then you will 
 =
                               have a intermediate difference frequenc=
y at 
                                9KHz, well within human hearing range=
 (20Hz to 
                                20KHz). This was just an example=
, but all 
                                electronic equipment generates u=
ltrasonic 
                                signals just by turning them on.=
 From this 
                                theory I always felt that EVP w=
ere generated 
                                within a few inches of the r=
ecorder.</DIV>
                                <DIV> </DIV>
          =
                      <DIV>We are able to reproduce this affect in not 
   =
                             only radio with superheterodyne systems but al=
so 
                                with acoustics and audio as in some pas=
sive 
                                sonars and a commercial produce calle=
d the 
                                "audio spotlight" by Dr. Joseph Pomp=
eii.</DIV>
                                <DIV> </DIV>
              =
                  <DIV>Frank R.<BR><BR>--- On <B>Mon, 6/8/09, Zack 
       =
                         Widup <I><w9sz.zack@gmail. com></I></B> 
   =
                             wrote:<BR></DIV>
                             =
   <BLOCKQUOTE 
                                style=3D"BORDER-LEFT: rgb(1=
6,16,255) 2px solid"><BR>From: 
                                Zack Widup =
<w9sz.zack@gmail. 
                                com><BR>Subject: R=
e: [EVP-ITC] New 
                                ideas<BR>To: EVP-ITC@yaho=
ogroups .com<BR>Date: 
                                Monday, June 8, 2009=
, 1:56 PM<BR><BR>
                                <DIV id=3Dyiv100209972>
 =
                               <DIV id=3Dygrp-text>
                       =
         <DIV>
                                <DIV>Fascinating! I've had t=
his idea that the 
                                EVP are often not r=
ecorded by the 
                                microphone but somehow make=
 their way in at the 
                                actual point whe=
re the storage is made, 
                                whether it be anal=
og (tape) or 
                                digital. <BR></DIV>
    =
                            <DIV>So much we don't know ...</DIV>
          =
                      <DIV> </DIV>
                                <DI=
V>Zack</DIV>
                                <DIV><BR> </DIV>

           <DIV>
                                <DIV>I am curious if anyon=
e with a microphone

V>
                                <DIV> </DIV>
                      =
          <DIV>I took part in an investigation 
                 =
               of Ashmore Estates, near Ashmore IL, on Saturday 
          =
                      night. We had six video cameras set up in the 
      =
                          three halls of the building. The video for 
     =
                           all was being monitored and 
              =

          =

       =
                         conected to the central location. I wonder what 
 =
                               we might have heard if we did?</DIV>
